page.title: 07HEALTH IN PROBUS 2
page.content: {Health Care in the Probus Area contd.} Looking after the health of families at home is a team effort with 8 people attached to the practice serving 6 & a half thousand patients.One full_time & one part_time midwife are responsible for the ante_natal & immediate post_ natal care.Most mothers now go to hospital for the birth.The health visitors,one full_time & one part_time care for children from 10 days old until school age & also help the elderly,of whom there is a large but not increasing number.The district nurses look after the medical & surgical cases.The biggest improvement in their work has come with disposable syringes,dressings etc.Previously dressings had to be sterilised in the oven,sometimes with unfortunate results!
